title: Moroccan lamb with apricots
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '600g lean lamb, diced', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', 'juice and zest of 1 unwaxed orange', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon honey', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '175g unsulphured dried apricots', '50g flaked almonds']
